price: Kò sí ìṣírò-iṣẹ́ wọn lọ́dọ̀ ẹnì kan bí kò ṣe lọ́dọ̀ Olúwa mi, tí ó bá jẹ́ pé ẹ bá fura.
arabic: إِنۡ حِسَابُهُمۡ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّيۖ لَوۡ تَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: in ḥisābuhum illā ʿalā rabbī law tashʿurūna
